item.title: Error on loading rs.jar - <dc.a>
item.dc:creator: @axerz axerz_
item.description:
@axerz wrote:

i loaded the client class located in the runescape JAR, then called init() and it caught this error:

lf at dc.a(Unknown Source) at client.init(Unknown Source) at Runescape.(Runescape.java:22) at Runescape.main(Runescape.java:72)

apparently, dc.a is this method:

static final int a(int i1, int i2, int i3, int i4) { RuntimeException r5; try { ab = ab + 1; if ((8 & gb[i3][i4][i1]) != 0) { return 0; } if ((i2 < i3) && ((2 & gb[1][i4][i1]) != 0)) { return i3 - 1; } return i3; } catch (r5) { throw dc.a(r5, new StringBuffer("dc.C(").append(i1).append(44).append(i2).append(44).append(i3).append(44).append(i4).append(41).toString()); } }i do not know what can possibly wrong.

here is my program:

[code]import java.net.*;
import java.applet.Applet;
import java.applet.AppletStub;
import java.applet.AppletContext;
import java.io.File;
import javax.swing.JFrame;
import java.awt.event.MouseListener;
import java.awt.event.MouseEvent;

public class Runescape extends JFrame implements MouseListener, AppletStub {

Runescape() {
    try { 
        URL url[] = { new File("runescape.jar").toURI().toURL() };
        URLClassLoader cl = new URLClassLoader(url);
        a = (Applet) cl.loadClass("client").newInstance();
        setSize(600, 600);
        setResizable(true);
        setDefaultCloseOperation(EXIT_ON_CLOSE);
        a.setStub(this);
        a.init();
        a.start();
        add(a);
    }catch(Exception e) {
        e.printStackTrace();
    }
    
}

public void appletResize(int width, int height) {
}

public AppletContext getAppletContext() {
    return null;
}

 public URL getCodeBase() { 
      try { 
           return new URI("http://world62.runescape.com").toURL(); 
      } catch (Exception ex) { 
           ex.printStackTrace();
           return null;
      } 
 } 

 public URL getDocumentBase() { 
      try { 
           return new URI("http://world62.runescape.com/m0").toURL(); 
      } catch (Exception ex) { 
           ex.printStackTrace();
           return null;
      } 
 }

public String getParameter(String name){
    return null;
}

public boolean isActive() {
    return true;
}
public void mouseReleased(MouseEvent e){}
public void mousePressed(MouseEvent e){} 
public void mouseExited(MouseEvent e){}
public void mouseEntered(MouseEvent e){}
public void mouseClicked(MouseEvent e) {
    System.out.println("X - "+e.getX()+"tY - "+e.getY());
}

public static void main(String args[]) {
    new Runescape().setVisible(true);
}

Applet a;

}[/code]
